description.name: xrpbep20
description.tagline: XRP bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-xrp Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept XRP bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/xrp receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/xrp wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
